definition: to learn is to know one's ignorance (the Book of Rites 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4])
pinyin: xue2 ran2 hou4 zhi1 bu4 zu2

sentences.english: I just wanted to write down everything the professor said and memorize it.
sentences.chinese: 我就是把教授讲的话原原本本纪录下来然后记住。

sentences.english: Place the rice noodles in a large bowl, and cover with warm water.
sentences.chinese: 把米线放进一个大碗里，然后用温水浸泡。

sentences.english: Bll the boys laughed to hear the good news.
sentences.chinese: 听见这个好动静然后，所有的男孩都笑了。

sentences.english: Sit down and plan out a strategy for defeating your doubt.
sentences.chinese: 坐下来然后制定一项击败怀疑的计划。

sentences.english: And given those types of input, will get back output.
sentences.chinese: 然后鉴于输入类型返回结果输出。

sentences.english: A spectrum is then obtained and telemetered to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 然后记录它的光谱，并将数据通过遥测系统发回地面。

sentences.english: And we scheduled it and we get it and my dad and my sister would help trim it.
sentences.chinese: 先做安排然后实践，爸爸和姐姐会帮忙修剪圣诞树。

sentences.english: Then slide the blade out the opposite end.
sentences.chinese: 然后从另一端将刀片滑出。

sentences.english: Blend oils and then add to a bowl of steaming water and inhale for five minutes.
sentences.chinese: 混合油，然后添加到一碗热气腾腾的水和吸入五分钟。

sentences.english: The thief walked out of the gallery with the picture underneath his painter's smock.
sentences.chinese: 他把画藏在了漆工的工作服下然后把它带出了画廊。

sentences.english: In a moment, you'll begin to feel light-headed, then drowsy.
sentences.chinese: 马上，你会开始感到头晕，然后昏昏欲睡。

sentences.english: Then he rushed into Mr Sun's kitchen to save her.
sentences.chinese: 然后他冲进孙奶奶家的厨房去救她。

sentences.english: Turn right onto Ford Road and take the first street on your left.
sentences.chinese: 右转到福特路，然后第一条街左转。

sentences.english: I would have carried him to the deepest part and dropped him in it.
sentences.chinese: 我会把他背到最深的地方然后把他丢下去。

sentences.english: Hold the mouth of a balloon filled with air. Let it go suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 捏紧一个充气的汽球口，然后突然松开手。

definition: to catch and hold on/to continue/to go on to do sth/to follow/to carry on/then/after that/subsequently/to proceed/to ensue/in turn/in one's turn
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
direct (opposite: indirect 間接|间接[jian4 jie1])/immediate/straightforward
to hold/to contain/to grasp/to take hold of/handle/particle marking the following noun as a direct object/classifier for objects with handle/classifier for small objects: handful

to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)
